cases.title: Real Estate Valuation Expert Methodology Deemed Reliable
cases.description: Plaintiff's Real Estate Valuation Expert Witness was allowed to testify on land valuation in a title insurance case.

cases.title: Cardiology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Despite No First Hand Knowledge
cases.description: The court allowed plaintiff's Cardiology Expert Witness to testify solely on his review of the medical records.

cases.title: Logistics Expert Witness Testifies in Negligence Case
cases.description: The US District Court (Middle District of Pennsylvania) allowed plaintiff's Logistics/Freight Forwarding Expert Witness to testify in a negligence case involving the alleged improper loading of a truck.
